howItWorks.title: Get Started in 3 Easy Steps
howItWorks.description: From signup to your first event in minutes

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.description: Sign up for free and choose your role. No credit card required.

step2.title: Create or Browse Events
step2.description: Organizers create events, attendees discover and register easily.

step3.title: Manage & Attend
step3.description: Track registrations and enjoy seamless event experiences.

benefits.title: Built for Success
benefits.description: Join thousands of successful event organizers who trust EventHub

testimonials.title: Loved by Thousands
testimonials.description: See what our users have to say about EventHub

testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.content: EventHub has transformed how we manage our tech conferences. The analytics features have helped us grow our events by 300%.

testimonial2.name: Michael Chen
testimonial2.content: As an attendee, I love how easy it is to find and register for events. The interface is intuitive and I never miss an event.

testimonial3.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonial3.content: The multi-role system is perfect for our organization. We manage everything from one platform and productivity has doubled.
